attributes.action: Make garages lower the fuel price at the pump.
attributes.additional_details: It’s costing the consumer enough with other household fuel and the garage fuel price is out of control
attributes.background: Make garages lower the fuel price, the overall price of the barrel has gone down and not being reflected at the pump. They are still working off prices when there was a shortage.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about petrol prices, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In any case, decisions about petrol prices are a matter for retailers, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Stop charging VAT on fuel duty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411
